hours_text:
### Discover //

# Plan Your Visit

## Hours & Admission

### Museum Hours

Tuesday – Sunday, 10AM – 5PM

_We are closed on Mondays, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Eve, Christmas Day, New Year’s Day, and Independence Day.  
We are open from 10AM – 2PM New Year’s Eve._

### ADMISSION

Fuller Craft Museum offers admission by donation as part of our commitment to accessibility.

Groups are welcome to self-tour, but we request that you please notify us if you are bringing a group of more than 8 people so we may staff accordingly; please fill out the form on our [Group Visits](https://fullercraft.org/private-tours/) page. 

Organized tours with a tour guide are available for a fee: please see our [Group Visits](https://fullercraft.org/private-tours/) page for more information. 

## While You Are Here

### Parking

Free parking is available. Accessible parking is located in the lower lot, located at the rear of the building/Education entrance.

### Food

We do not offer food service on-site, but you are welcome to bring a brown bag lunch and enjoy your meal in the Museum Lounge. For organized and catered affairs, please contact our Event Coordinator, Shareefah Mapp, at smapp(at)fullercraft.org.

There are also several local restaurants in the area. Feel free to ask the front desk for recommendations! Limited snacks and drinks are available for purchase at the gift shop.

### Accessibility

_Please feel free to call us to inquire about accessibility needs and assistance._

admission_text:
### JOIN //

# Membership

### **Membership connects you to Fuller Craft Museum, New England’s premiere destination for contemporary craft.**

****

**All Members** receive advance invitations to Fuller Craft Museum’s exhibition openings and other special events through our **Member newsletter**! Plus, Members receive **special discounts** to ticketed events. Other benefits are listed below. Please note that discounts are available on Fiber and Woven Memberships for students, seniors, artists, and those living 150+ miles away.

Contact Mario Centeio at mcenteio@fullercraft.org or (508)588-6000 x144 for more information.

**Or, choose your level of engagement:******

**Metal Membership – $1,000**

  * **Private tour** of a select collection or studio (once annually) with FCM, including lunch
  * Reciprocal membership to 1,000 + museums in the US & Canada
  * Premiere gift from FCM mailed to your home
  * Invitations for **ten guests** to Members-only events and tours (6 annually)
  * 10% Discount in The Shop at FCM and on our Classes**

**Wood Membership – $500**

  * Reciprocal membership to 1,000 + museums in the US & Canada
  * Premiere gift from FCM mailed to your home
  * Invitations for **ten guests** to Members-only events and tours (6 annually)
  * 10% Discount in The Shop at FCM and on our Classes**

**Clay Membership – $275**

  * Reciprocal membership to 1,000 + museums in the US & Canada
  * Free gift from FCM mailed to your home
  * Invitations for **four guests**...

# Fuller Craft Museum

#### Hours

**Sunday:** | 10AM – 5PM  
  
Closed on Mondays, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Eve, Christmas Day, Independence Day, and New Year’s Day. Open from 10AM – 2PM New Year’s Eve.

#### Visit

Come to Fuller Craft Museum and discover the world of contemporary craft! Admission is offered on a pay-what-you-can basis.

[Plan Your Visit](https://fullercraft.org/plan-your-visit/)

#### Become a Member

Members receive discounts at the gift shop and to classes and workshops, plus, advanced invitations to special events.

[Become a Member](https://fullercraft.org/membership/)
